channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: Ruth Weiss (writer)
item.description: Ruth Weiss (née Löwenthal; 26 July 1924 – 5 September 2025) was a German-born South African writer who focused on anti-racism in all its forms. She was a well-known anti-apartheid journalist and activist, exiled by South Africa and Rhodesia for her writings. She was based in Denmark and wrote in both English and German. Her historical fiction for young adults reflects her battles against racism in Germany and Africa.

item.title: Angus Sutherland (actor)
item.description: Angus Redford Sutherland (born September 3, 1982) is a Canadian-American producer and actor. In the early stages of his career, he was an actor before transitioning to producing.

item.title: Ian Chen (actor)
item.description: Ian Chen (Chinese: 陳琦燁; was born on 7 September 2006) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Evan Huang in the ABC sitcom Fresh Off the Boat (2015–2020) and Eugene Choi in the DC Extended Universe films Shazam! (2019) and Shazam! Fury of the Gods (2023).

item.title: Jesse Johnson (actor)
item.description: Jesse Wayne Johnson (born December 7, 1982) is an American actor. He is the son of actors Don Johnson and Patti D'Arbanville.
